sense.def:
A particular thing
je ena sama določena stvar, ne pa tudi druge iste vrste.

seg.quote: Let me ask you about one particular artist.
She wasn't, at that particular moment, watching the cat at all.

sense.def:
Kadar ima oseba ali stvar neko lastnost ali lastnino, ki je
particular
, ta pripada samo njej.

seg.quote: It is important to discuss a child's particular problems and interests.
Each species has its own particular place on the reef.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in particular
pokažemo, da to, kar govorimo, velja prav posebej za eno stvar ali osebo.

seg.quote: Joan Greenwood in particular I thought was wonderful.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
particular
poudarimo, da je nekaj večje ali bolj silovito kot sicer.

seg.quote: The shortage of airfields gave particular concern.
Renshaw jotted down a few particulars in his notebook.

sense.def:
Kdor je
particular
, ima zelo visoka merila in ni zlahka zadovoljen.

seg.quote: They're quite particular about their personnel.
